Zhonghe Jiang

Control boy who likes robotics!

Introduction

We are participating in MathWorks Minidrone Competition at MATLAB EXPO 2019 UK. This student competition aims at designing a line follower algorithm for a minidrone using the latest features from Simulink.

Implementation

Our algorithm submitted for the simulation round is capable of finishing different tracks. The shortlist for Round 2 will be released on 28 August 2019, stayed tuned for more information or email me if you are interested in doing similar project.
